items.sentence: A friend is someone who likes you even though he knows everything about you.
I don\'t have much time, so I\'m going to drop in at a fast-food restaurant.
Tom copied all the files on his internal hard disk to an external hard disk.
Tom told Mary that he loved her shoes even though he thought they were ugly.
I need to hide these Christmas presents somewhere that Tom can\'t find them.
I have four computers, but two of them are so old I don\'t use them anymore.
Tom has been running around the office like a chicken with its head cut off.
Tom was waiting for Mary to leave, so he could get back to reading his book.
I don\'t know how long Tom lived in Boston, but it was at least three years.
Tom and Mary looked at each other with concerned expressions on their faces.
